code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./Joke.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Joke=_ref=>{let{text,updateVotingLeaderboard,id,jokeNum}=_ref;const[votes,setVotes]=useState(0);const currentVoteCount=userVote=>{if(userVote==='up'){return votes+1;}else{return votes-1;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Joke",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Joke-votearea",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>{setVotes(vote=>vote+1);updateVotingLeaderboard(id,currentVoteCount('up'),jokeNum);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-thumbs-up"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>{setVotes(vote=>vote-1);updateVotingLeaderboard(id,currentVoteCount('down'));},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-thumbs-down"})}),votes]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Joke-text",children:text})]});};export default Joke;
